globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/a11y-dialog@7.0.0/dist/a11y-dialog.min.js https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.9.1/dist/leaflet.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/orestbida/cookieconsent@v2.8.6/dist/cookieconsent.js https://unpkg.com/leaflet.markercluster@1.5.3/dist/leaflet.markercluster.js; style-src 'self' https://unpkg.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; connect-src 'self'; font-src 'self'; frame-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: *.tile.openstreetmap.org server.arcgisonline.com; manifest-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; worker-src 'none';
